quiz.q: At FL350 Air Traffic Control (ATC) has reported to the flight crew that the aircraft is +425 feet above assigned altitude. Which statement is true?
a: This represents a gross height error. If the problem is not identified(following a test of all the RVSM related parts/systems per table 1) a waviness inspection check must be performed

According to GMM 2-2-201; in order to retain your qualification for RVSM Line Maintenance, the fleet Line...
According to AMM 34-10-00-2-0, any incidents of gross height-keeping errors on RVSM status...
A 777 FIM procedure identifies a faulted Mode Control Panel(MCP)...
a: Refer to the RVSM SYSTEM COMPONENTSS section in AMM 34-10-00-2...

quiz.q: Special MEL 20-01 can be applied for which of the following reasons

In reference to RVSM, what information is contained in the FedEx form M-3585?
a: The RVSM Components/Maintenance Table 1, which lists the AMM Adjutement...

quiz.q: Of the AMM 24-10-00-2, Table 1 components listed below, which cmoponent requires an additional...
RVSM separation limits the vertical separation by:
What are the benefits to FedEx of flying in RVSM Airspace?
a: Reduces fuel cost, access to preferred ROUTES, reduces labor costs

quiz.q: If you are on a 777 aircraft, how could you quickly determine if the have performed RVSM maintenance?
a: Reference the 777 RVSM Components/Maintenance - Table 1 (FedEx form M-3585) located in the Orange AML

quiz.q: Which of the following requires an RVSM qualified AMT to return the aircraft to RVSM operation?
Reduced Vertical Separtation Minimum (RVSM) Airspace is in any airspace or route between flight level(FL)___ and FL___.
Refer to AMM 34-10-00-2, 777 RVSM Components/Maintenance - Table 1. How would a Non-RVSM...
a: Troubleshoot using the FIM, replace the component per AMM 34-21-04-4, FACT the discrepancy, Open a new WRI and apply MEL 20-01 due to Non-RVSM AMT performing RVSM maintenance, and dispatch the aircraft
